changelog:
- Expands Van Damme's voiceset and adds it to Berlin and Paris
- Replaces two awful Hush greetings ('Note to Hush...') with more generic greeting lines ('Hello' 'Don't bother me')
- American Variety option now adds Western voice variety to Hawke's Bay
- Sapienza (Racist Mode): Replaces all generic (not dictated by IO) local NPC voicelines with mostly Hispanic ones, the female voices aren't as bad
